dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset comprises 200 annotated short-axis cardiac cine-MR images from a cohort of 100 patients with four classes. It is used for evaluating segmentation algorithms in medical imaging.
dcterms:title: ACDC dataset

dcterms:description: The PROMISE12 dataset was made available for the MICCAI 2012 prostate segmentation challenge, consisting of MRI scans of 50 patients with various diseases, converted into 2D slices for segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: PROMISE12 dataset
